description: This file contains code that demonstrates how to integrate Daytona tools with an agent, including setting up the agent, importing necessary modules, and providing instructions for code execution and validation within a Daytona sandbox environment.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent configured with specific tools and instructions for executing tasks.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A model class representing the Claude AI model used by the agent.

classes.name: DaytonaTools
classes.description: A class providing integration with Daytona sandbox tools for the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method used to output responses from the agent, including code snippets and explanations.
